title: OpenAI Sam Altman & Greg Brockman: Fireside Chat in Seoul, Korea | SoftBank Ventures Asia
description:
- OpenAI and SoftBank Ventures Asia co-hosted a fireside chat with Sam Altman, OpenAI's Co-founder/CEO of OpenAI, and Greg Brockman, Co-founder/President of OpenAI, in Seoul, Korea on June 09, 2023
- Moderated by JP Lee, CEO of SoftBank Ventures Asia and Kyunghyun Cho, a professor at NYU
- Sponsored by the Ministry of SMEs and Startups of the Republic of Korea

#OpenAI #SamAltman #GregBrockman #ChatGPT #AI #SoftBankVenturesAsia #SBVA

Outline
0:00 Opening - OpenAI Intro & Social responsibility
26:00 AI and religion
27:52 OpenAI's failures
30:52 Competition
32:55 PMF for AI startup
35:20 Universal basic income
40:40 Potential monopoly in AI
44:20 Copyright
45:53 OpenAI's plans in gaming
48:27 About Sam Altman
49:50 OpenAI's plans in investing in startups
50:53 Computing hardware
53:01 Energy consumption
55:21 Advice for young generation
